Newton.Galen Merriam House: The Galen Merriam House is a historic house at 102 Highland Street in Newton, Massachusetts. This ​2 1⁄2-story wood-frame house was built in the 1840s, apparently for Galen Merriam, a Boston coal merchant. The mansion house features elaborate Italianate styling, including brackets in its eaves and on its porch, which wraps around three sides of the house.
